snippet: For the end-of-summer splendor of this dish, perhaps the best choice of wine would be a richer Provençal rosé from Bandol, Palette or Cassis.
abstract: Eric Asimov suggests pairing a rich rose wine from Bandol, Palette or Cassis with lobster pasta.
lead_paragraph: For the end-of-summer splendor of this dish, perhaps the best choice of wine would be a richer Provençal rosé from Bandol, Palette or Cassis.

headline.main: Lobster Pasta Requires a Light, Crisp Touch
